verses.verse: (Godâ€™s Rule over the Nations) To the leader. Of the Korahites. A Psalm. (Ps 98.8; 106.47; Isa 55.12) Clap your hands, all you peoples; shout to God with loud songs of joy.
(Deut 7.21) For the LORD, the Most High, is awesome, a great king over all the earth.
(Ps 18.47) He subdued peoples under us and nations under our feet.
(1 Pet 1.4) He chose our heritage for us, the pride of Jacob whom he loves. Selah
(Ps 68.33; 98.6) God has gone up with a shout, the LORD with the sound of a trumpet.
(Ps 68.4; 89.18) Sing praises to God, sing praises; sing praises to our King, sing praises.
(1 Cor 14.15) For God is the king of all the earth; sing praises with a psalm. (Heb Maskil)
(1 Chr 16.31) God is king over the nations; God sits on his holy throne.
(Ps 72.11; 89.18; 97.9; Rom 4.11, 12) The princes of the peoples gather as the people of the God of Abraham. For the shields of the earth belong to God; he is highly exalted.
